Text.Page:
Next on the hit parade: {@LinkCreature:8#2021#caiman mercenaries} and {@LinkCreature:8#2042#guards}

We're diminishing their numbers, but we're also sending a message: it's bad business to work for gulas.

Wipe them out. Yank their fangs, too. I'll make a necklace.
Glad to hear they're dead. Those things give me the creeps.
We need to send a message. Make sure you sign it in blood.
